identity
********


Description
===========

Manages credentials in a database to access service resources.


Available Commands
==================

* add-lock

* change-compartment

* create-oracle-database-resource-principal

* delete

* get

* list

* refresh-oracle-database-resource-principal-credential

* remove-lock

* update-oracle-database-resource-principal

* validate-oracle-database-resource-principal-credential
